resourceTemplates.name: my-mfa-registration-summary
resourceTemplates.title: My MFA/SSPR registration summary
resourceTemplates.description: Fetches the authentication methods registration summary for the current user via the reports endpoint.

resourceTemplates.name: my-auth-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My authentication method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets details for a specific authentication method by id from the user's registered methods.

resourceTemplates.name: my-email-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My email method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one email authentication method by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-fido2-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My FIDO2 method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one FIDO2 authentication method by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-authenticator-app-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My Microsoft Authenticator app method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one Microsoft Authenticator app method by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-phone-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My phone method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one phone authentication method by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-software-oath-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My software OATH method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one software OATH authentication method by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-temporary-access-pass-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My temporary access pass method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one temporary access pass method by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-windows-hello-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My Windows Hello for Business method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one Windows Hello for Business method by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-platform-credential-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My platform credential method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one platform credential method (passkey) by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-password-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My password method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets one password method by id.
